summary: User timeline_22 documents recovery from severe depression, including setbacks and ultimate progress.

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. I can't do anything right I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I'm spiraling out of control Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. talked to a friend about what I'm going through Taking a mental health day tomorrow. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. I feel empty inside I can't focus on anything. I stopped taking my medication My therapist recommended meditation so I tried a new coping mechanism and I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been isolating myself from everyone. I want to give up on everything I haven't showered in a week But today I reached out to an old friend joined a support group and we made plans to meet up. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. I want to give up on everything I haven't showered in a week Forced myself to go for a walk today set healthy boundaries and called my sister. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Three weeks without self-harming. wrote in my journal So proud of myself. I acknowledge my progress Almost slipped up. I'm a burden to everyone But I reached out for help instead. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. wrote in my journal I'm not giving up Had a bad moment yesterday. I'm disgusting But I worked through it using my tools. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I'm a burden to everyone I gave up trying Started using the coping strategies from therapy. joined a support group I'm trying to be patient with myself. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. I feel empty inside I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I isolated myself from all my friends Today though, I managed to joined a support group which is a small victory.
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. I can't do anything right I can't see a future for myself But yesterday I finally joined a support group and scheduled an appointment. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. I'm tired of existing I can't focus on anything. I pushed everyone away My therapist recommended meditation so I used my DBT skills and I'm worth the effort
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. Life is meaningless I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I'm spiraling out of control Today though, I managed to reached out for help which is a small victory.
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I'm a burden to everyone My performance has been terrible. I pushed everyone away Met with HR about accommodations. talked to a friend about what I'm going through They're being supportive. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I want to give up on everything My performance has been terrible. I pushed everyone away Met with HR about accommodations. wrote in my journal They're being supportive. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
